DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Africa , Asia , Europe , Oceania , North America South America . The aim clinical trial evaluate potential liraglutide induce maintain weight loss 56 week obese subject overweight subject co-morbidities . Furthermore , aim investigate long term potential liraglutide delay onset type 2 diabetes subject diagnose pre-diabetes baseline . Based body mass index ( BMI ) pre-diabetes status , subject randomise either 68 week ( 56 week randomise treatment follow 12 week re-randomised treatment period ) 160 week treatment ( 160 week treatment applicable subject pre-diabetes status baseline ) .

DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtain Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30.0 kg/m^2 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27 kg/m^2 presence comorbidities treat untreated dyslipidemia and/or hypertension Stable body weight Preceding fail dietary effort Known type 1 type 2 diabetes Glycosylated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) 6.5 % ( Screening visit 1 ) FPG 126 mg/dL ( 7 mmol/L ) ( Screening visit 2 ) 2 hour postchallenge ( OGTT ) plasma glucose 200 mg/dL ( 11.1 mmol/L ) ( Screening visit 2 ) Screening calcitonin 50 ng/L Family personal history multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2 ( MEN2 ) familial medullary thyroid carcinoma ( FMTC ) Personal history nonfamilial medullary thyroid carcinoma History acute chronic pancreatitis Obesity induce drug treatment Use approve weight lower pharmacotherapy Previous surgical treatment obesity History major depressive disorder suicide attempt Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure 100 mmHg )
